title: PhD position on high-speed IC design for optical I/O
field: Communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electromagnetism, Electronics, Engineering Physics, and 4 moreOptical Engineering,Optics,Photonics,Signal Processing
job_description: Ghent University is one of the most important education and research institutions in the Low Countries, ranked 71 in the Academic Ranking of World Universities (http://www.shanghairanking.com/). On a daily basis, over 15,000 staff members and 49,000 students implement its motto "Dare to Think". Ghent University's mission statement is characterized by qualitative education, internationally renowned research and a pluralistic social responsibility.
employer_description: Ghent University is one of the top 100 universities in the Dutch language area, with more than 44,000 students and 15,000 staff members.
